title: Inflation Rises, Biden Falls | Guest: Richard Paul Evans | 12/10/21
description:
Glenn and Stu give President Biden the appropriate praise as inflation hits a record high. Glenn talks with civil rights attorney Aaron Siri to discuss his FOIA request to see data on the COVID vaccine. Glenn previews his Friday Exclusive with Bo Snerdley, the right-hand man of Rush Limbaugh. Jason Buttrill joins Glenn and Stu to discuss Glenn’s upcoming sit-down with President Trump and a past interview with a former president. Author Richard Paul Evans joins Glenn to discuss his latest novel, “The Christmas Promise." Glenn and Stu discuss how the best Christmas memories can come from the worst experiences. Eric Fellman joins to discuss how his tragic story with a miraculous ending inspired the Hallmark movie “A Godwink Christmas.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
